remarks: The projective subspace closure of a finite set of atoms is a closed subspace.  Compare the (non-closed) subspace version ~ pclfinN and also ~ pclcmpatN .  (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pclfincl.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pclfincl.c $e |- U = ( PCl ` K ) $.
pclfincl.s $e |- S = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
pclfinclN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A /\ X e. Fin ) -> ( U ` X ) e. S ) $.
